text: The location of Puteri Harbour is eloquently peaceful, perfect for grabbing a nice chill beer and bar snacks. Not forgetting to mention that it's very comfortable for a date on Sunday.
Was great before Covid. But since then it has became pasar malam and electric scooter place that totally ruined this place vibes
Drinks are pretty much regularly priced, and the food is decent and inexpensive. Live music on particular nights - look out for DJ James Alexander who spins on occasion.
Great al fresco bar with a million dollar view of the Marina. Perfect place to chill for a drink.
